name: Hard Toys And Games 2 Quiz / Test | Hobbies | 10 Questions

questions.text: What category does the color pink denote in the Trivial Pursuit Baby Boomer Edition?
How many points is each Pac-Man power pill worth?
What is the lowest number card in a Pinochle deck?
How many dice are used in a game of Chuck-A-Luck?
How many squares are there on a Snakes and Ladders board?
What board game was banned in the Soviet Union?
How many 'energy dots' are there on a Pac-Man screen?
Monks from which country invented the game of Dominoes ?
questions.explanation:
China.

	Invented in China in ancient times. Introduced in Europe in the middle of the 18th century

questions.text: What card suit originally represented the lances of the nobility?
What color poker chip is usually assigned the lowest value?
